attributes.action: TV license to be free for all pensioners of 70 years of age and older.
attributes.additional_details: Pensioners are staying at home more due to the cost of living. One of their enjoyments is watching television. If the tv license was made free of charge it may enable pensioners to get out of their houses and socialize more and spend some of the money that they save on the license fee. There appears to be more repeated programs especially on daytime tv. Over the last few months pensioners have suffered the brunt of spending cuts.
attributes.background: I want our Government or Parliament to consider making the tv license free of charge for all pensioners of age 70 and older.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund Free TV licences for all pensioners.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728658
